Title:
Botryosphaeriacous fungi associated with blueberries in
China
Abstract:
Blueberry stem blight is one of the branch diseases caused
by Botryosphaeriaceae, in the isolation and identification of Pathogens
of blueberry blight in Shandong Province, Fujian province and Yunnan
Province, 5 new species of Lasiodiplodia and 1 new species of
Neofusicoccum were found.
